column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We had the chorizo and bacon wrapped dates
column2: which were soooo good. I had never tried them
column3: but I'm glad I did! The calamari was cooked well
column4: it was crunchy but still tender. The garlic potato salad and the spicy potatoes were also tasty. I didn't try the chicken empanada
column5: but I think my friends liked them...
